description:
Nice graphics. Nice gameplay. Nice everything.
Just about as much as you can possibly expect from a free Linux game.
summary: A Pretty Thrifty, Pretty Smooth Game

description: awesome game, the mechanics work great, the concept is super creative and fun. They managed the atmosphere just right. It maybe isn't a game you would play a 1000 times, it's a little repetitive for me, I think it would feel more complete if in conjunction with other mechanics. But just be clear, this game is nowhere near boring, nor unfinished, really recommend that you at least try it
no lo he descargado pero se ve que es muy aburrido.

El juego es bastante entretenido y simple. Ideal para matar el tiempo.

Este pelao se mueve mucho en la cama, jaja.
